ValidationRule.description:
Checks follow up date for: Today < Followup Date <= 30 days
only fires if the field is not null, or if it is changed after the initial save.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Automatically Created")), ISNEW(), NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Manual_Invoice'), OR( Follow_Up_Date__c > today()+30, Follow_Up_Date__c <= today() ) ),
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Automatically Created")), ISChanged(Follow_Up_Date__c), NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Manual_Invoice'), OR( Follow_Up_Date__c > today()+30, Follow_Up_Date__c <= today() ) ),
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Automatically Created")), ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Manual_Invoice', OR( Follow_Up_Date__c > today()+60, Follow_Up_Date__c <= today() ) ),
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Automatically Created")), ISChanged(Follow_Up_Date__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Manual_Invoice', OR( Follow_Up_Date__c > today()+60, Follow_Up_Date__c <= today() ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Follow up date cannot be set as today, a past date. or beyond 30 days in the future. There are a few exceptions that will allow a 60 day follow up date.
